posts.title: How To Poo At Work Book
posts.content: Taking a deuce at the workplace is an art form – and the “How to Poo at Work” book will teach you the time honored traditions of this ancient practice so you can poop while on the clock. You’ll learn everything from which stall to use and avoiding awkward encounters.

posts.title: Beginner Cheese Making Kit
posts.content: Treat your palate to incredibly rich flavors you won’t find at the supermarket by making your own cheese using this beginner’s kit. The kit works with either cow, goat,  or sheep’s milk and contains all the ingredients needed to make everything from mozzarella to ricotta.

posts.title: Unicorn Poop Soap
posts.content: Experience the unmatched freshness only magical fecal matter can provide when you shower with the unicorn poop soap. The surface of this vegan friendly bar of multicolored soap glitters and entices the nasal passages with scents like butterscotch and vanilla.

posts.title: Bamboo Straws
posts.content: Upgrade your drink by sipping out of it using bamboo straws. These biodegradable straws measure just under 8″ and contain a fun novelty design that makes each straw appear like a short piece of bamboo there to brighten up the appearance of your drink.

posts.title: Storm Trooper Coffee Mug
posts.content: This is the coffee mug you were looking for! This high detailed ceramic Storm Trooper’s Head Coffee Mug is a great collector’s item for any Star Wars fan, and goes great alongside the equally amazing Darth Vader and Boba Fett Coffee Mugs.

posts.title: Planet Socks
posts.content: Show Mother Earth some love by sporting the stylish planet socks. The novelty design displayed across the ankle features a map of the continents that transform into a small and soft sock globe you can toss around, when rolled up.

posts.title: Cupcake Bath Bomb
posts.content: Indulge in some delicious “me” time by unleashing one of these scrumptious cupcake bombs into your bath tub. Made in the shape of a mouth-watering cupcake, it features an intoxicating fruity scent and is designed to simultaneously moisturize and soften the skin.

posts.title: Garmin Vivoactive 3 Smartwatch
posts.content: The Garmin Vivoactive 3 smartwatch is the high-tech timepiece that is ideal for those who love to stay connected while staying active. It can do everything from monitoring your heart rate and daily activity to ordering you an Uber.

posts.title: Automatic Fruit Peeling Machine
posts.content: Enjoying a light healthy snack is easier than ever thanks to this automatic fruit peeling machine. You simply secure the spherical fruit or vegetable on the metallic spikes, adjust the thickness of the blade, and  your fruit will be peeled in just 3 minutes.

posts.title: Unicorn Gold Toilet Spray
posts.content: Keep your porcelain throne from reeking of death when you do your business by using this Unicorn Gold toilet spray. This non-toxic spray is designed to trap foul odors above and beneath the water, so your bathroom will always smell fresh.

posts.title: Aromatherapy Memory Foam Pillows
posts.content: Make your nights more calming than ever by resting your tired head on one of these aromatherapy memory foam pillows. They’re made from soft yet supportive foam and are available in a variety of soothing scents like chamomile and peppermint.

posts.title: Aquatic Treadmill
posts.content: Maximize the effectiveness of your cardio workout by exercising on the aquatic treadmill. The treadmill helps you stay cool as you work up a sweat, while providing a low impact workout that engages the entire body so you can burn more calories in less time.
